<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Construct Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3065) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Inventor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=408" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 28</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Advanced Construct Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3055)

</column>

---

Thanks to your continual tinkering, your construct companion has advanced to an astounding new stage of engineering, enhancing all its attributes. Your construct companion becomes an [incredible construct companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=1613).

<title level="2">Incredible Construct Companion leads to...</title>
[Paragon Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3079)
name: Incredible Construct Companion
